name: Dominator_Assault.Savage_Assault
display_help: Command wild animals and Tear at your foes with your own animalistic attacks that primarily inflict Lethal damage and cause additional damage over time. Call Swarm, Maiming Slash, Vicious Slash, Unkindness and Feral Charge all grant stacks of Blood Frenzy. Each stack of this buff grants a small recharge buff and endurance cost discount. You may have up to 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy active at a time. Blood Frenzy can be maintained, or it can be consumed to empower Rending Flurry and Call Hawk. Using one of these consumers while you have 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy offers an additional benefit to these powers, but will also leave you Exhausted for a short time. While Exhausted you cannot build Blood Frenzy.

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Savage_Assault.Call_Swarm
powers.display_help: You summon a swarm of stinging insects to harass your foe causing Light Lethal damage over time and reducing both their movement speed and defense. This power grants 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Light DoT, Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Light DoT(Lethal), Foe -Defense, -Speed, +1 Blood Frenzy

display_info: 5 ticks of 11.62 lethal damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
5 ticks of 18.65 lethal damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
-7.50% strength to defense for 8s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 8s on target
-20.00% strength to jump height for 8s on target
Ignores buffs and enhancements

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Savage_Assault.Maiming_Slash
powers.display_help: You execute a savage slash at your foe's lower body causing moderate lethal damage and minor damage over time. The foe will also have their movement speed reduced moderately. Maiming Slash grants 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal), Foe -Speed, +1 Blood Frenzy

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Savage_Assault.Vicious_Slash
powers.display_help: You tear at your foe with both hands dealing high lethal damage and causing minor lethal damage over time. Foes struck by this attack have a high chance to be knocked down. Vicious Slash grants 2 stacks of Blood Frenzy. Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Self +2 Blood Frenzy

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Savage_Assault.Call_Ravens
powers.display_help: With a mighty roar, you command an unkindness of ravens to quickly assault and harass your foes. Your foes will suffer Moderate Lethal damage over time and have their speed and defense reduced. The power inflicts lethal damage over time that scales in strength with the number Blood Frenzy stacks. This power grants 2 stacks of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Savage_Assault.Rending_Flurry
powers.display_help: You wildly slash at nearby foes to deal moderate lethal damage and cause minor lethal damage over time. This power consumes all Blood Frenzy and will deal additional damage per stack of Blood Frenzy consumed. If you have 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy while activating this power, its radius is greatly increased, but causes you to become Exhausted for a short time. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -Blood Frenzy

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Savage_Assault.Blood_Craze
powers.display_help: You go into a blood craze, making you quickly shrug aside some of the damage received. Blood Craze will immediately heal you for a small amount and cause you to heal for a moderate amount of health over a short time seconds. Recharge: Long

display_info: 101.74 heal on self
Unresistable
10 ticks of 25.43 heal over 9.1s on self after 1s delay
Unresistable

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Savage_Assault.Call_Hawk
powers.display_help: You call forth a hawk ally to swoop in and viciously peck at your target causing High Lethal damage. The attack often catches foes off their guard and can knock them down as well as reducing their chance to hit. This power's damage over time effect will scale with the number of stacks of Blood Frenzy. Using this power with 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy causes you to become Exhausted for a short time, but the duration of its damage over time effect is increased. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: High, Special DoT, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), Foe -To Hit, Knockdown, -Fly

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Savage_Assault.Feral_Charge
powers.display_help: You throw yourself at your target while slashing and tearing wildly dealing moderate lethal damage and causing it to suffer from additional minor lethal damage over time. The damage of this power can increase based on how far away you charge from, with up to double damage dealt at its strongest. Feral Charge builds 1 stacks of Blood Frenzy for every 20 ft in between your target and you, up to 3 stacks. Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), +3 Blood Frenzy, Self Teleport
